channel.title: NodeJS on Malek Zaag
channel.description: Recent content in NodeJS on Malek Zaag

item.title: E-commerce Website
item.description: E-commerce Website : Overview : This project is among my first web projects designed in my early steps of self learning. It is an e-commerce shop to sell musical instruments. You need to create an account in order to view cart, view shop and make orders, it includes also a payment module for users. GitHub Repo

item.title: Todo list using ReactJS and NodeJS
item.description: Todo List This app is built with NextJS and ExpressJS as a backend library. I used MongoDB as a database for my users and their todos. This app allows users to authenticate, register and create their todos that will be saved to the database. Architecture UML diagrams This is the Usecase Diagram of the app : and this is the entity-relationship Diagram : Docker Docker is an open platform for developing, shipping, and running applications.
